title: [House Brigatta, Back Porch]
description: Shade from the tree to the north provides just enough relief from the sun to make this a perfect area for outdoor parties.  Surrounding trees and the walls of House Brigatta itself prevent the noises from the bustle of Wehnimer's from intruding.

Moonlight filters through the trees to the north illuminating the porch in a soft glow.  Surrounding trees and the walls of House Brigatta itself prevent the noises from the bustle of Wehnimer's from intruding.
